bossDialog: (A large, sticky glob drops from the ceiling, splatting onto the floor and taking a menacing shape in front of you, before lurching forward!)
(Several creatures jump out of the bubbling goop covering the room and close in to attack, as does the goop itself!)
(You hear a sloshing noise and barely have time to realize what's going on before your creatures pull you out of the way of a Concoction rising from the ground beneath you!)

cardBonuses.2: Enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_DISARMED} have a 10% lower chance to Dodge.
cardBonuses.4: Enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_DISARMED} have a 15% lower chance to deal critical damage.

master.dialog: I hope your creatures don't rely too much on their Artifacts, because my Concoctions are going to turn them into dust! Let's fight!
master.name: Milmind

name: Concoction
